wikipedia_page.main: George Harry Langley (14 July 1881 – 14 February 1951) was an English academic who worked primarily in Dhaka, which was then in British India. He served as the second vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka from 1926 to 1934.

response: * George Harry Langley, 2nd vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka
* George Harry Langley (1881–1951), English academic wand vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka
